meanings.definition: A member of the family Elateridae, which includes click beetles.
meanings.sent1: The elaterid jumped up with a clicking sound.
meanings.sent2: I found an elaterid in the garden today.
meanings.sent3: Why did the elaterid bring earplugs to the party? To avoid hearing too many clicks!
meanings.sent4: The elaterid was like a tiny acrobat, flipping through the air.
meanings.sent5: The elaterid's click was as loud as a tiny drumbeat.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the family Elateridae.
meanings.sent1: The elaterid species has unique clicking abilities.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study elaterid behavior in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The elaterid family reunion was full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like elaterid beetles in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The elaterid characteristics make them stand out among other insects.
